'''Radiant Spincrystal 125''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[The Jadeite Reflection]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the desk next to [[Fangju]] in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]].
